item.description:
I will have tables reserved for whoever RSVP’s yes. If you are a no rsvp then please do not reply at all. Thanks.

Super Singles Dance ® MA & RI - Holiday Inn Hotel - Mansfield, MA
· Saturday, February 2, 2013
SINGLES DANCE 8:00 pm - 12:00 am
( $12. before 9pm, $15. after 9pm)
Free Dance Lesson @ 7:30pm,
Top DJ Dance Music, Complimentary Hor D'ouevres, Special Dance Performance, Door Prizes and Cash Bar
· Holiday Inn Mansfield
31 Hampshire St, Mansfield, MA (map)
42.028008 -71.248810
(Exit 7A Rte 140S off Rte. 95 to Forbes Blvd and stay in right hand lane to end and to Hotel sign)
Minutes from Rte 95 & I-495 ...Take Rte 140 to Forbes Blvd and stay in right hand lane to end and into Parking Lot at Hotel Sign
item.name: singles dance
